search.query: index=metrics | stats values(businessGroup) as bg | dedup bg | table bg

panel.title: Platform Benefits

single.title: Savings from Developer Productivity - Current

search.query: index=platform_benefits | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | stats values(savingFromDeveloperProductivity) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Savings from API Reuse - Current

search.query: index=platform_benefits | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | stats values(savingFromAPIReuse) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Savings from Maintenance Productivity - Current

search.query: index=platform_benefits | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | stats values(savingFromMaintenanceProductivity) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Savings from Reuse In Maintenance - Current

search.query: index=platform_benefits | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | stats values(savingFromReuseInMaintenance) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

single.title: Total Savings - Current

search.query: index=platform_benefits | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | stats values(totalSavings) as total | stats max(total) as "Savings"

panel.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings - Timeline

chart.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings - Timeline

search.query: index=platform_benefits | timechart values(totalSavings) as "Savings"

panel.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings by type - Timeline

chart.title: Platform Benefits - Total Savings by type - Timeline

search.query: index=platform_benefits | timechart values(savingFromDeveloperProductivity) as "Developer Productivity", values(savingFromAPIReuse) as "API Reuse", values(savingFromMaintenanceProductivity) as "Maintenance Productivity", values(savingFromReuseInMaintenance) as "Reuse in Maintenance"

chart.title: Coreservices - Business Groups - Timeline

search.query: index=metrics | timechart dc(businessGroup) as "Business Groups"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Runtime versions - Current Count

table.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Runtime versions - Current Count

search.query: index=metrics | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | rename runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.runtimesUsed{} as "Runtime versions" | table "Runtime versions"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Current

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Current

search.query: index=metrics | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.applicationsStarted) as started, values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.applicationsStopped) as stopped | stats max(started) as "Started", max(stopped) as "Stopped" | transpose

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - OnPrem - Applications by Status - Timeline

search.query: index=metrics | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | timechart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.applicationsStarted) as "Started", values(runtimeManagerMetrics.hybrid.sandbox.applicationsStopped) as "Stopped"
